TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed RuntimeHelpers extends System.Object

Docs.summary: A group of functions used as part of the compiled representation of F# sequence expressions.

Docs.summary: Creates an anonymous event with the given handlers.

Docs.param: A function to iterate and test if end of sequence is reached.
A function to retrieve the current element.
Docs.summary: The F# compiler emits calls to this function to implement the compiler-intrinsic conversions from untyped System.Collections.IEnumerable sequences to typed sequences.

Docs.param: A computation to be included in an enumerator's Dispose method.
Docs.summary: The F# compiler emits calls to this function to implement the try/finally operator for F# sequence expressions.
